nodes.text: The Ministry of Supply was part of the Alliance to Restore the Republic's Civil Government. The Ministry was in charge of begging, borrowing, or stealing essential supplies such as food and clothing to keep the Alliance military forces in fighting shape.

While the Alliance grew an abundance of food on safe worlds and planet in the Outer Rim Territories, transporting it was another matter. The Ministry of Supply relied on the transports assigned to the Support Services.
